query.statement:
SELECT X.PJT PJT, X.NAM NAM, X.ADR ADR, X.TXT TXT, X.USR USR, X.PHO PHO, X.BMT BMT, X.YDT YDT, X.MDT MDT, X.TEM TEM, X.TEM_NM TEM_NM, X.RQT RQT, X.REF REF, X.DTEXT2 DTEXT2, X.DTEXT3 DTEXT3, X.DTEXT4 DTEXT4, X.SEQ SEQ, X.NUM NUM FROM ( -- 저장이력없는 초기데이터 SELECT X.PJT PJT, X.NAM NAM, X.ADR ADR, '승강설비 무상점검 만료에 따른 유상점검 계약 체결 요청의 건' TXT, CAST(#USR# AS CHAR(10)) USR, (SELECT USERMBPN FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT= #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = #USR#) PHO, X.BMT BMT, SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,2)YDT, SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),5,2)MDT, CAST(#TEM# AS CHAR(3))TEM, CAST(#TEM_NM# AS CHAR(30))TEM_NM, '' RQT, '' REF, (SELECT DTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = '183' AND CODE1 = 'CS181' AND CODE2 = #TEM#) DTEXT2, (SELECT DTEXT3 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = '183' AND CODE1 = 'CS181' AND CODE2 = #TEM#) DTEXT3, (SELECT DTEXT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = '183' AND CODE1 = 'CS181' AND CODE2 = #TEM#) DTEXT4, -- (SELECT SAPHEE.FILLINZERO(INT(COALESCE(MAX(CS316_SEQ),'00'))+1,2) SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 WHERE MANDT -- = #G_MANDT# AND CS316_TEM = #TEM# AND CS316_YDT = #YDT# AND CS316_MDT = #MDT#) SEQ, (SELECT VALUE(COALESCE(MAX(CS316_SEQ),'00'),'01') SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS316_TEM = #TEM# AND CS316_YDT = #YDT# AND CS316_MDT = #MDT#) SEQ, '현엘-'||#TEM#||'-'||SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),5,2)||'-'||(CAST((SELECT SAPHEE.FILLINZERO( INT(COALESCE(MAX(CS316_SEQ),'00'))+1,2)SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS316_TEM = #TEM# AND CS316_YDT = #YDT# AND CS316_MDT = #MDT#)AS CHAR(2))) NUM FROM ( SELECT B.CS116_PJT PJT, MAX(A.KUNNR_NM) NAM, MAX(A.ADDR1) ADR, MIN(B.CS116_BMT) BMT FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST116 B ON A.POSID = B.CS116_PJT WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID= #PJT#
GROUP BY B.CS116_PJT ) X
UNION ALL -- 저장이력 있는 경우 SELECT A.CS316_PJT PJT, A.CS316_NAM NAM, A.CS316_ADR ADR, A.CS316_TXT TXT, A.CS316_USR USR, A.CS316_PHO PHO, A.CS316_BMT BMT, A.CS316_YDT YDT, A.CS316_MDT MDT, A.CS316_TEM TEM, CAST(#TEM_NM# AS CHAR(30))TEM_NM, A.CS316_RQT RQT, A.CS316_REF REF, B.DTEXT2 DTEXT2, B.DTEXT3 DTEXT3, B.DTEXT4 DTEXT4, A.CS316_SEQ SEQ, '현엘-'||#TEM#||'-'||SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),3,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(HEX(CURRENT DATE),5,2)||'-'||(CAST((SELECT MAX(CS316_SEQ)SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS316_TEM = #TEM# AND CS316_YDT = #YDT# AND CS316_MDT = #MDT#)AS CHAR(2))) NUM FROM SAPHEE.ZCST316 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE B ON A.CS316_TEM = B.CODE2 AND B.CODE1 = 'CS181' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS316_TEM = #TEM# AND A.CS316_YDT = #YDT# AND A.CS316_MDT = #MDT# AND A.CS316_PJT = #PJT# --AND A.CS316_SEQ = #SEQ# )X
ORDER BY YDT,MDT,BMT,SEQ ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY WITH UR
